entities.name: umbridge

entities.description: Harry is the one being watched by Umbridge and is cutting his hand with a quill.

relationships.description: Umbridge is watching Harry from outside her window.
Harry uses the quill to cut his hand.
Harry writes on the parchment with his quill.
Harry cuts his hand with a quill.
Umbridge touches Harry's hand with her fingers.
